Package com.sun.enterprise.module.single

Class Summary
ClassPathBasedModulesRegistry Implements a modules registry based on a class-path style of module description using a single class loader (capable of loading the entire class-path)
ManifestProxy Implements a manifest proxying
ManifestProxy.SeparatorMappings  
ProxyModule Creates a Module implementation based on a single class loader
ProxyModuleDefinition Creates a ModuleDefinition backed up by a a single classloader.
SingleModulesRegistry Normal modules registry with configuration handling backed up by a single class loader.
StaticModulesRegistry Implementation of the modules registry that use a single class loader to load all available classes.
